spec_firm_decoupling.title: TD-ARCH-FIRM-COUP: Firm Decoupling Spec
spec_firm_decoupling.instruction_raw: Analyze Firm-Department coupling (self.parent) and design Orchestrator-based messaging pattern. Write specification to output_path.

spec_missing_tx_handlers.title: TD-RUNTIME-TX-HANDLER: Missing Tx Handlers Spec
spec_missing_tx_handlers.instruction_raw: Design missing transaction handlers (bailout, bond_issuance) and their registration in the TransactionEngine. Write specification to output_path.

spec_cockpit_test_regression.title: TD-TEST-COCKPIT-MOCK: Cockpit Regression Fix Spec
spec_cockpit_test_regression.instruction_raw: Analyze test failures related to deprecated system_command_queue in Cockpit 2.0 tests. Write spec to modernize test mocks.
